mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` (client_id, helper_id, content, help_time, phone, reward, status, publish_time, accept_time, complete_time) VALUES (#{clientId}, #{helperId}, #{content}, #{helpTime}, #{phone}, #{reward}, #{status}, #{publishTime}, #{acceptTime}, #{completeTime})
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, u1.username as client_username, u1.avatar as client_avatar, u2.username as helper_username, u2.avatar as helper_avatar FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN user u1 ON o.client_id = u1.user_id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON o.helper_id = u2.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT o.*, u1.username as client_username, u1.avatar as client_avatar FROM `order` o LEFT JOIN user u1 ON o.client_id = u1.user_id WHERE o.status = '0' ORDER BY o.publish_time DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE helper_id = #{userId} AND status = '2'
